briefTitle: A Home-based Module to Promote Mindful Breathing Awareness for COPD Patients
officialTitle: A Home-based Intervention to Promote Mindful Breathing Awareness Through Pursed-lip Breathing Training for COPD Patients

arms.label: Home-base pulmonary rehabilitation with mindful breathing modu

summary: The purpose of this study is to develop a mindful breathing module to an already effective and developed home based rehabilitation program for guiding COPD patients in a mindful breathing practice and further palliate breathlessness and anxiety.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Chronic Respiratory Disease Questionnaire (CRQ)- Dyspnea Score

effectByArm.arm: Home-base Pulmonary Rehabilitation With Mindful Breathing Module
